## Grid2Wrapper() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Wraps the combined country code selector's subcomponents into a MUI `Grid2` components.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export default function Grid2Wrapper({ grid2ItemProps, grid2SelectorProps, grid2InputProps, grid2ErrorProps, selectorSize, inputSize, errorSize, children, }: Grid2WrapperProps): import("react/jsx-runtime").JSX.Element;
```
